title: Deep-Sea eDNA AI Pipeline
description: AI-driven bioinformatics pipeline for identifying marine biodiversity from environmental DNA sequences. Uses K-means/DBSCAN clustering and custom neural networks for automated taxonomy classification from phylum to species level.

title: TARS â€” Local LLM AI Agent
description: A privacy-first AI agent using local LLMs and Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) to synthesize custom data without external APIs. Features custom persona modules for TARS-style adaptive dialogue.

title: Habit Tracker
description: A gamified habit-tracking web app with streaks, XP, achievements, and visual analytics. RPG-like experience that transforms daily routines into engaging progression systems.

title: Retail Price Optimization
description: Data-driven ML approach for optimal retail pricing strategies using statistical analysis, predictive modeling, and demand elasticity estimation.

title: Terminal Graphical UI (TUI)
description: A Claude Code-inspired terminal AI assistant that runs entirely offline using local LLMs. Features a rich Textual-based TUI with file browsing, AI reasoning, and terminal output panels.

title: Portfolio v3 (This Site)
description: Personal portfolio built with Next.js 16, React 19, GSAP scroll animations, Spline 3D, and Lenis smooth scrolling. Designed for performance and visual storytelling.
